thread.title: Alabama announces all-star roster for annual game against Mississippi
thread.title_full: Alabama announces all-star roster for annual game against Mississippi

title: Alabama announces all-star roster for annual game against Mississippi
text:
View/Post Comments 
Clay-Chalkville 's Ty Pigrome and Spanish Fort 's Tyler Johnston have been selected as the quarterbacks for the 2015 Alabama all-star squad. 
The Alabama-Mississippi All-Star Classic will be played in Mississippi for the first time this year â€“ at M.M. Roberts Stadium in Hattiesburg on Dec. 12. Kickoff is set for noon. 
Alabama's defense should be strong, with the state's three top prospects on that side of the ball -- uncommitted Gordo linebacker Ben Davis , uncommitted Carver-Montgomery linebacker Lyndell Wilson and Greenville star and Auburn commitment Marlon Davidson on the defensive line. 
Other notable players selected are Saraland receiver and Southern Cal commit Velus Jones , Wenonah defensive lineman and Alabama commit Quinnen Williams ; Theoodore running back and Florida commit La'Mical Perine ; Clay-Chalkville reciever and Alabama commit T.J. Simmons ; Austin offensive lineman; Hoover linebacker and Florida commit Jeremiah Moon ; and Alabama commit Deonte Brown ; and Hewitt-Trussville running back and Ole Miss commit Jarrion Street . 
Alabama's head coach is Thompson first-year coach Mark Freeman. 
This post will be updated. 
Here's the complete 2015 roster: Pos.
